name: Super Rope Hero:City in Danger
description:
City Rescue Robot is one of the best surviving city games. In this game, you can survive the city from different troubles. In this game you can not just save humans you can also save animals. In this game, you can drive vehicles and especially ambulances to carry patients to the hospital. There are different modes for game lovers. You guys can enjoy games with multiple heroes. In this game, you can also enjoy the zombies surviving city experience.
Dead Strive: Zombie Survival FPS Shooting is your battlefield where you are the only survivor and to keep yourself alive for long you will have to search and hunt all the deadly zombies. In this action and strategy shooting game become a hero and experience the best Zombie shooting game.
Let the Zombie survival shooting begins.
- Zombie Alien escapes game-challenging missions
-Excellent stunning 3d graphics and realistic sound effects create a natural environment
- shooting games no wifi need
-Smooth and easy controls are easy to move from one city to another
-A large group of Zombie and Aliens enhance your shooting skills
-Zombie and Alien apocalypse action and realistic gameplay
- Realistic physics zombie sniper game
-Modern weapons and detailed gameplay
-Slow-motion actions
-Sprint button to run away from the stupid zombie
